content.question: Which of the following best describes the pattern in the atmospheric <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration data over the past <math alttext="200,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>200</mn><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>000</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> years?

choices.label: The concentration of <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext></mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> fluctuated between <math alttext="150 parts per million" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>150</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>ppm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="250 parts per million" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>250</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>ppm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The concentration of <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> fluctuated between <math alttext="150 parts per million" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>150</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>ppm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="250 parts per million" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>250</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>ppm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> until recently, when the concentration rose exponentially.

The concentration of <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> remained constant at first from <math alttext="200,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>200</mn><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>000</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> years ago until <math alttext="50,000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>50</mn><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>000</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> years ago, and then began a steady decline.

The concentration of <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> rose exponentially to <math alttext="400 parts per million" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>400</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>ppm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and leveled off at carrying capacity.

content.answer: The concentration of <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> fluctuated between <math alttext="150 parts per million" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>150</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>ppm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="250 parts per million" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>250</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>ppm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> until recently, when the concentration rose exponentially.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe patterns or trends in data.
